apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this empowering emoji depicts a man with a medium skin tone, confidently seated in a manual wheelchair. Apple's meticulous design brings realistic detail to the wheelchair's form, with subtle highlights and shadows created by its signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients. The soft, rounded edges of the figure convey approachability and strength, representing independence, mobility, and inclusivity within the diverse emoji language available on Apple devices.
